item.description:
OK, I admit I"m partial to this event because I'll be performing in one of the groups (Harmony Night). But even if I wasn't, I'd go anyway!

Here is the ad from the Lebanon Opera House site:
The 10th Annual Fundraiser for LOH!
A Capella Showcase
Sunday, June 3rd, 2012 - 3:00 pm

Join the area's best a cappella vocalists in an afternoon of amazing music!
Stay Tuned
Zazzle
High Voltage
The Honeymooners
North Country Chordsmen
Ompompamusic
Harmony Night
LHS Superlatives, Chorus, Sha Na Na, and Showtime
LJHS Treble Makers
Mid-Vermont Christian Academy
Fast Track


Pricing: $10 Adult General Admission; $7 Senior; $5 Child

Hope to see you there!

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: The 10th Annnual A Cappella Showcase at LOH!
